article_title: Daymon Hires Former HomeServe CIO Dave Berry
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Daymon Worldwide has hired as CIO Dave Berry, who left his position as HomeServe USA CIO earlier this month.
twitter.title: Daymon Hires Former HomeServe CIO Dave Berry
